title: Music Session Materials Creator – Chord Charts, Melody Audio/MIDI & Harmonies (Christian Songs, Remote)
job_overview:
We’re looking for a musically trained Christian audio assistant who can prepare complete session-ready materials for our original Christian songs. You’ll help structure, document, and clean up song materials to be used in professional Musiversal recording sessions (drums, acoustic guitar, piano, etc.). We're flexible with either part time or full-time being okay for the right candidate.

You should be confident transcribing music, building chord charts, and editing melody and harmony tracks into grid-locked WAVs and MIDI.

? Your Deliverables Will Include (per project):
Chord Chart PDF

Clear structure: verse, chorus, bridge, etc.

Time signature, key, tempo

Optional: bar numbers and section labels (A, B, C...)

Melody Audio Stem (Melody.wav)

Solo vocal or clean topline stem aligned to the tempo grid

Can be extracted, cleaned, or rebuilt from provided demo

Harmony/Instrument Stem (Harmony.wav)

Chordal reference such as acoustic guitar, piano, or soft pad

Must be in time and match chord chart

Optional MIDI File (Melody.mid or TempoMap.mid)

Melody MIDI and/or tempo map (if tools available)

Bonus: Instrumentation or production suggestion notes (optional but valuable)

???? Ideal Skills:
Music transcription and chord recognition by ear

DAW skills (Ableton, Reaper, Studio One, Logic, etc.)

Vocal/melody editing and tempo grid alignment

Strong communication in English

Familiarity with Christian music and worship songs is a bonus

???? Tools You Should Be Comfortable With:
Any DAW (Reaper preferred if free)

Melodyne or manual audio alignment

Noteflight, MuseScore, or other chord chart software

Google Drive and file naming conventions

???? Example Materials You’ll Match or Exceed:
Here are examples of what your finished files will resemble:

Chords Chart.pdf

Audio Stem – Melody.wav

Audio Stem – Harmony.wav

Optional MIDI Tempo Map.mid

(These will be provided in your test project.)

???? Terms:
All work is work-for-hire under U.S. copyright law

You’ll sign a Work-for-Hire & IP Assignment Agreement

You agree that all deliverables belong to Seven Streams Media LLC

???? To Apply:
Please send:

A short intro or voice memo explaining your experience

Samples of similar work (chord charts, MIDI, or audio stems)

Your preferred hourly rate or per-song pricing

Your current setup (DAW/software used)
